languages.text: "Пепелище в душе Ульфара впитало блеклую серость, оставив после себя лишь угольные разводы. Они рвутся наружу, смазывают оттенки... И потускневшее золото уже не сияет столь ярко".

traits.locale_text: "Пепелище в душе Ульфара впитало блеклую серость, оставив после себя лишь угольные разводы. Они рвутся наружу, смазывают оттенки... И потускневшее золото уже не сияет столь ярко".

languages.text: "The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They are straining to break out. They smudge his hues... And the tarnished gold no longer shines as brightly."
languages.original_text: "Пепелище в душе Ульфара впитало блеклую серость, оставив после себя лишь угольные разводы. Они рвутся наружу, смазывают оттенки... И потускневшее золото уже не сияет столь ярко".

traits.locale_text: "The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They seek their way out. They smudge his hues... And the fogged gold no longer shines as brightly."
"The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They seek their way out. They smudge his hues... And the fogged gold no longer shines as brightly."

"The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They are straining to break out. They smudge his hues... And the tarnished gold no longer shines as brightly."

"The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They are straining to break out. They smudge his hues... And the tarnished gold no longer shines as brightly."

"The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They are straining to break out. They smudge his hues... And the tarnished gold no longer shines as brightly."

languages.text: “乌尔法灵魂中冰冷的余烬吸收了凄凉的灰色，只留下木炭一样的斑点。这些斑点渴望破土而出，它们玷污了他的颜色……被玷污的黄金，已经不再像以前那样闪闪发光了。”
languages.original_text: "The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They are straining to break out. They smudge his hues... And the tarnished gold no longer shines as brightly."

traits.locale_text: “乌尔法灵魂中冰冷的余烬吸收了凄凉的灰色，只留下木炭一样的斑点。这些斑点渴望破土而出，它们玷污了他的颜色……被玷污的黄金，已经不再像以前那样闪闪发光了。”

languages.original_text: "The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They are straining to break out. They smudge his hues... And the tarnished gold no longer shines as brightly."

languages.text: «Las frías ascuas del alma de Ulfar han absorbido el lóbrego gris, dejando solo manchas de carbón. Se esfuerzan por salir. Manchan sus tonos... y el oro sucio no brilla tanto como antes».
languages.original_text: "The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They are straining to break out. They smudge his hues... And the tarnished gold no longer shines as brightly."

traits.locale_text: «Las frías ascuas del alma de Ulfar han absorbido el lóbrego gris, dejando solo manchas de carbón. Se esfuerzan por salir. Manchan sus tonos... y el oro sucio no brilla tanto como antes».

languages.text: 「ウルファーの魂の中の冷たい炎は、惨めな灰色を吸収し、炭の斑だけを残しています。それらは、燃え上がろうと必死になっています。それらは彼の色彩をにじませ…色褪せた黄金はもはや輝きを失っています」
languages.original_text: "The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They are straining to break out. They smudge his hues... And the tarnished gold no longer shines as brightly."

traits.locale_text: 「ウルファーの魂の中の冷たい炎は、惨めな灰色を吸収し、炭の斑だけを残しています。それらは、燃え上がろうと必死になっています。それらは彼の色彩をにじませ…色褪せた黄金はもはや輝きを失っています」

languages.text: "Die kalte Glut in Ulfars Seele hat das triste Grau absorbiert. Zurück blieben nur kohlefarbene Flecken. Sie brennen darauf, auszubrechen. Sie beflecken seine Farbtöne ... Und das befleckte Gold strahlt nicht mehr so hell."
languages.original_text: "The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They are straining to break out. They smudge his hues... And the tarnished gold no longer shines as brightly."

traits.locale_text: "Die kalte Glut in Ulfars Seele hat das triste Grau absorbiert. Zurück blieben nur kohlefarbene Flecken. Sie brennen darauf, auszubrechen. Sie beflecken seine Farbtöne ... Und das befleckte Gold strahlt nicht mehr so hell."

languages.text: « Les braises froides dans l'âme d'Ulfar ont absorbé le gris lugubre, ne laissant plus que quelques taches couleur charbon ici et là. Elles cherchent à s'échapper. Elles viennent souiller ses nuances... et l'or terni ne brille plus aussi intensément. »
languages.original_text: "The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They are straining to break out. They smudge his hues... And the tarnished gold no longer shines as brightly."

traits.locale_text: « Les braises froides dans l'âme d'Ulfar ont absorbé le gris lugubre, ne laissant plus que quelques taches couleur charbon ici et là. Elles cherchent à s'échapper. Elles viennent souiller ses nuances... et l'or terni ne brille plus aussi intensément. »

languages.text: "Ulfar'ın ruhundaki soğuk korlar, kederli griliği içine çekmiş. Geriye sadece kömürün lekeleri kalmış. Dışarı taşmak için çırpınan bu lekeler, Ulfar'ın renk tonunu bozuyor... Altın kararmaya bir yüz tutsun, artık eskisi kadar parlak ışıldamaz."
languages.original_text: "The cold embers in Ulfar's soul absorbed the dismal grey, leaving only charcoal splotches. They are straining to break out. They smudge his hues... And the tarnished gold no longer shines as brightly."

traits.locale_text: "Ulfar'ın ruhundaki soğuk korlar, kederli griliği içine çekti; geriye sadece kömürün lekeleri kaldı. Lekeler, dışarı taşmak için çırpınıyor; Ulfar'ın renk tonunu bozuyor... Altın kararmaya yüz tutmuşsa, artık eskisi kadar parlak ışıldamaz."
